attributes.action: keep the ban on fox hunting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Tory party have openly stated they intend to try to reverse the ban on fox hunting should they be elected to government.  We the undersigned believe fox hunting is shameful, archaic, inhumane, and that such cruelty has no place in British culture, and as such,  the ban on fox hunting should remain.
